name: Coronavirus Update
author: H7.org

sections.description:
COVID-19 Plugin

Coronavirus Plugin for WordPress

IMPORTANT: the plugin is evolving daily, please don’t hesitate to add your idea, request changes and features or to report a bug: https://quarantine.country/coronavirus/plugins/wordpress/issues

Coronavirus Update Widget with coronavirus tracker. Cases by country and by state. Free COVID-19 live update for WordPress, based on multiple sources via coronavirus API. Source code and .zip download soon, see demo:

  • Coronavirus update USA
  • Casos de coronavirus en España

Coronavirus Update for WordPress is built on the robust and reliable coronavirus data API: api.quarantine.country. By accessing the API, you are not sharing any information. The service is free and does not collect data about you or your WordPress website. Please read and accept the api.quarantine.country privacy policy to understand and to use the service.
sections.installation: See documentation for changing language, country and other details or add your requests here.
sections.faq:
• How to change plugin language?
  • How to change plugin texts?

  • fix Country selector

1.1.1

  • fix recommended by WordPress Plugin Directory

1.1.0

1.0.0
